next_window: Watch for a potential retest of Pivot R1 at 143.9543, which could extend to 144.1035 if DXY remains stable or strengthens.
summary: Given the stable close of the DXY near its pivot R1 and the upward movement of USD/JPY closing near its high, a long position is favored. DXY strength supports USD/JPY longs, suggesting upward momentum may continue.
